text: Hans Plomp (29 January 1944 â€“ 6 August 2024) was a Dutch writer, playwright and poet. Plomp was born in Amsterdam. Together with fellow writer , he was the driving force behind saving the village of Ruigoord near Amsterdam from demolition in July 1973. He was a member of the . Plomp died on 6 August 2024 from prostate cancer at the age of 80 years old.Hans Plomp (80) overleden, grondlegger van kunstenaarsdorp Ruigoord ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Dutch poets Category:Dutch writers Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
